```{r}
#| message: false

plot3 <-  read_csv("/Users/neera/OneDrive/Documents/Desktop/projects/Customer_Segmentation/Mall_Customers.csv") |>
  drop_na() |>
  ggplot(aes(x = `Annual Income (k$)`, y = `Spending Score (1-100)`)) +
  geom_point(color = "blue",
             size = 3, 
             alpha = 0.6) + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", 
              se = FALSE, color = "red", 
              linetype = "dashed",
              formula = y ~ x,) +
  scale_x_continuous(
  limits = c(20, 140),
  breaks = seq(20, 140, by = 20)
  ) +
  labs(title = "Relationship between Annual Income \n and Spending Score",
       x = "Annual Income (k$)",
       y = "Spending Score (1-100)",
       caption = "Data Source: Mall_Customers.csv") +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 15) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, face = "bold"),
        axis.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
        panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "gray", size = 0.5),
        panel.grid.minor = element_line(color = "lightgray", size = 0.25))

interactive_plot <- ggplotly(plot3)
interactive_plot
```
